name: Zombies Battle Shoot
description:
Only you and your sniper gun are the survivor of civilian citizen from zombie infection. This is one of the best first person zombies shooting game for modern users. Test your sniper shooting skills with this most modern zombie shooting game

Features:
• Shoot your way through zombie-filled corridors.
• Shoot tons of bullets with powerful guns.
• Realistic physics of shooting game.
• New and latest of the guns.
• Keep shooting until the dead are really dead
